moduleMetadataJson.name: Multi Gather Ping Sweep
moduleMetadataJson.description: Performs IPv4 ping sweep using the OS included ping command.
author: Carlos Perez <carlos_perez@darkoperator.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: IP Range to perform ping sweep against.
